snippet: City Ballet’s just-concluded season showed evidence of a renaissance, led by a new generation of ballerinas. But in some ways the company remains stagnant.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay asserts that New York City Ballet’s just-concluded season showed evidence of a renaissance, led by a new generation of ballerinas, but other promising talents within the company seem to be held back.
lead_paragraph: City Ballet’s just-concluded season showed evidence of a renaissance, led by a new generation of ballerinas. But in some ways the company remains stagnant.

headline.seo: New York City Ballet Is Changing, but Questions Remain
headline.main: City Ballet: Vivacity Breaks Up Doldrums
headline.print_headline: City Ballet: Vivacity Breaks Up Doldrums
